title: New licensing schemes for Andron – special student’s offer
content:
New licensing schemes have been launched for Andron. The idea behind is to stretch costs over time in order to keep the entrance price rather low.

A special instalment plan is offered for students, who now can get started with Andron at incredible €45.

Another special license is adressed at publishers who edit scientific journals, and their authors.

Since this kind of licensing is bound to handle a standing order payment it may be less interesting for those who don’t have a German bank account for the time being (banks tend to extra charge you for cross-border payment orders). Consequently the offerings [are presented here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040725/http:/www.signographie.de/contenido/index.php?contenido=3b73786a570fca618bd224903f3141e9) in German by now. But I’m prepared to give any further explanation in English if required.
author: Andreas Stötzner
